timeline.message:
Fix NPE for "ozone fs -ls ofs://om/" due to path field is null

Before fix:

bash-4.2$ ozone fs -ls ofs://om/
-ls: Fatal internal error
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.apache.hadoop.fs.shell.PathData.expandAsGlob(PathData.java:379)
	at org.apache.hadoop.fs.shell.Command.expandArgument(Command.java:250)
	at org.apache.hadoop.fs.shell.Command.expandArguments(Command.java:233)
	at org.apache.hadoop.fs.shell.FsCommand.processRawArguments(FsCommand.java:104)
	at org.apache.hadoop.fs.shell.Command.run(Command.java:177)
	at org.apache.hadoop.fs.FsShell.run(FsShell.java:327)
	at org.apache.hadoop.util.ToolRunner.run(ToolRunner.java:76)
	at org.apache.hadoop.util.ToolRunner.run(ToolRunner.java:90)
	at org.apache.hadoop.fs.ozone.OzoneFsShell.main(OzoneFsShell.java:79)

After fix:

bash-4.2$ ozone fs -ls ofs://om/
Found 2 items
drwxr-xr-x   - hadoop hadoop          0 1970-01-01 00:00 /volume1
drwxr-xr-x   - hadoop hadoop          0 1970-01-01 00:00 /volume2

Fix listStatus root result item prefix.

Before:

bash-4.2$ ozone fs -ls ofs://om/
Found 2 items
drwxr-xr-x   - hadoop hadoop          0 2020-02-12 01:04 /volume1
drwxr-xr-x   - hadoop hadoop          0 2020-02-12 01:04 /volume2

After:

bash-4.2$ ozone fs -ls ofs://om/
Found 2 items
drwxr-xr-x   - hadoop hadoop          0 2020-02-12 02:27 ofs://om/volume1
drwxr-xr-x   - hadoop hadoop          0 2020-02-12 02:27 ofs://om/volume2

listStatus on root and volume works now, recursive or not. Tested in CLI:

bash-4.2$ ozone fs -ls ofs://om/
Found 2 items
drwxr-xr-x   - hadoop hadoop          0 2020-02-12 02:27 ofs://om/volume1
drwxr-xr-x   - hadoop hadoop          0 2020-02-12 02:27 ofs://om/volume2

bash-4.2$ ozone fs -ls ofs://om/volume1/
Found 1 items
drwxr-xr-x   - hadoop hadoop          0 2020-02-12 02:27 ofs://om/volume1/bucket1

bash-4.2$ ozone fs -ls -R ofs://om/
drwxr-xr-x   - hadoop hadoop          0 2020-02-12 02:27 ofs://om/volume1
drwxr-xr-x   - hadoop hadoop          0 2020-02-12 02:27 ofs://om/volume1/bucket1
drwxrwxrwx   - hadoop hadoop          0 2020-02-12 02:34 ofs://om/volume1/bucket1/dir1
drwxrwxrwx   - hadoop hadoop          0 2020-02-12 02:34 ofs://om/volume1/bucket1/dir1/subdir1
drwxr-xr-x   - hadoop hadoop          0 2020-02-12 02:27 ofs://om/volume2
drwxr-xr-x   - hadoop hadoop          0 2020-02-12 02:27 ofs://om/volume2/bucket2
drwxrwxrwx   - hadoop hadoop          0 2020-02-12 02:34 ofs://om/volume2/bucket2/dir2
drwxrwxrwx   - hadoop hadoop          0 2020-02-12 02:34 ofs://om/volume2/bucket2/dir2/subdir2

bash-4.2$ ozone fs -ls -R ofs://om/volume1/
drwxr-xr-x   - hadoop hadoop          0 2020-02-12 02:27 ofs://om/volume1/bucket1
drwxrwxrwx   - hadoop hadoop          0 2020-02-12 02:29 ofs://om/volume1/bucket1/dir1
drwxrwxrwx   - hadoop hadoop          0 2020-02-12 02:29 ofs://om/volume1/bucket1/dir1/subdir1

bash-4.2$ ozone fs -ls -R ofs://om/volume1/bucket1/
drwxrwxrwx   - hadoop hadoop          0 2020-02-12 02:34 ofs://om/volume1/bucket1/dir1
drwxrwxrwx   - hadoop hadoop          0 2020-02-12 02:34 ofs://om/volume1/bucket1/dir1/subdir1

replies.bodyText:
The URI part (ofs://localhost:54607) can differ each time the client application initializes FileSystem. So I'd say we can't have a static RootFileStatusAdapter with the current impl.
Actually, the uri can be different each time getFileStatus is called, so we can't even have a class global variable to hold rootFileStatusAdapter.

e.g. if such call is made: listStatus(pathStr="/", recursive=true, startPath="/volume2/bucket2/dir2"), the result won't be what we expect.

timeline.message:
Use FsPermission.getDirDefault(). Root FileStatusAdapter mod time defaults to System.currentTimeMillis() now.
https://github.com/apache/hadoop-ozone/pull/547#discussion_r382219605
Use ofsPath.isRoot and ofsPath.isVolume to improve code readability.
Optimize listStatusVolume: remove unnecessary new OFSPath by using startBucket instead of startPath in listStatusVolume.
Fix listVolumesByUser usage; listStatusVolume: Change startBucket back to startPath for correctness.
